segments.text: Good evening , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I would like to book a table for 2 at 7:30 tomorrow evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , there are so many travelers that all our tables have been booked on that day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , please put my name in your waiting list . We know you are quite a good restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . We will phone you as soon as we have a vacant table .
segments.speaker: S1
